text:
Pizza... Oh, I'm sorry, the door was unlocked.

Say... did you just pee all over the floor in here? I like that.

name: thommy_h
text: It's great that Ray can just lie off the cuff like that. He doesn't even hesitate to feed the doctor a huge heap of bullshit.

text: I love it when Ray lies. Nothing is better than the Moviephone Defense though...

text: Side effects of zyrelax include headache, nausea, and eating nachos for every meal.

name: twotonturkey
text: Hey that was his BIRTHDAY, asshole!

name: twotonturkey
text: I have a CD by a punk band called the Piss Shivers.  Before reading this strip, that's the only time I've seen that term used in print.

name: rowboat
text: HEY YOU! Twotonturkey! Where are you from? Do you know where that band was from? I'm good friends with some guys who were in a band with that name in the 90's. They were never big (I don't even think they ever played outside my city), so I'm very curious as to whether or not you're talking about this band or another with the same name. If you're ever back this way, let me know.

name: twotonturkey
text: I live in Detroit, I got their CD in the used bin at a record store I went to all the time, based on the name alone.  Used CDs have a weird way of getting around.

name: odei
text: In 4 to 6 months rowboat will reply.

name: rowboat
text: Well I wonder...

name: mattylite
text: me too.  I mean I know some guys too.  Tell me!  Tell me now!!!

name: vymora
text: It's a bad feeling when you've done something so awful you require medication.

text: Am I the only guy here who believes Ray? Will the disguised piss shiverer ever turn up again?

text: Uh he kinda said he was the one that did it in the first panel.  So yeah I think you might be the only one.

text: Whoa, are there any other strips with a side comment??  DAMMIT now I have to look through the entire archive again with my head tilted slightly.

name: cailetshadow
text: Do not take that hand, Doc Andretti. Do not take the unwashed hand of a man with a piss-shiver.

name: atmus
text:
Actually, his hand was just holding his thong down. He let his pisstrument fly wherever it may.

That's how I do it at least.

name: sp1derbaby
text: I think you work in my building. I've always wanted to tell you how much I loathe your freestyling.

name: atmus
text: One time, someone got mad at someone else for pissing all over the seat of one of the regular style toilets.  They were so mad that they printed out a saign saying "Stop peeing on the seat, Lift and Aim!", So I did.  I should have signed my name first, as the sign was in no condition to be written upon afterwards.

name: johnnybaverage
text: Fuck, I lamed when I meant to chubby. Apologies.

name: echidnaboy
text: That is the behaviour of a psychopath .

name: ford
text:
If not for continuity issues, i could totally peg Doc Andretti as Lyle's illegal doctor. How else do you explain him grafting robot dog parts into beef while still wearing that archaic forehead mirror.

Hell of inconsistent.

Also, Zyrelax seems as Black-market as "Screw you, Hemmorhoid! FUCK you!"

name: i_love_kate
text: I have no idea how to vocalise that amalgamation of punctuation. But the attempt just cost me four of my minutes. Thank you, c dizzle.

name: beansdooma
text: Ray is just about the only guy who can casually greet a guy while grabbing his wang.

name: cmr
text: piss shiver can't possibly be a real thing, it is clearly a fake thing

name: edwell
text:
Post-micturition convulsion syndrome , also known as piss shivers , pee shivers , peegasm or whiz willies , is a phenomenon in which one feels a shiver running down the spine following urination. The shiver can produce a brief twitch, which is a form of myoclonus.

To date, despite years of discussion and theorizing, there is no agreed-on explanation of the phenomenon and no medical research into it. However, it has been mentioned occasionally in columns, and in one Internet poll, where about 83% of males and 58% of females reported experiencing it.

- Wikipedia

name: c_dizzle
text: If I stare at your avatar for more than 3 seconds, I swear to god the tentacles start to move.

name: cherubrocker22
text: This strip perfectly embodies Ray's character. It also continues the running joke that he'd rather tell crazy lies than admit to any weakness on his part.

text: One sees the aftermath and is baffled by it.  Are they standing up due to hygiene concerns, perhaps?

text:
I have heard of chicks who do that, especially if *OH NO!* the stall is all out of those wanky little seat covers.

Thursday Blogs

name: i_love_kate
text:
The hat belongs to the person until the person dies... At which point his corpse becomes the property of the hat.

Today, I am a genius.

text: Ray is concerned with his pepper touching the rim. But not with the Doc seeing his junk. He is a cat of complex priorities.

name: nice-on-water
text: Guess who just realized there was a side-comment, it was me guys, I just realize it.

name: thescrivener
text:
I've probably read this arc six times... but only now do I realize that "critical but stable" makes no sense. It's just medical-sounding, oxymoronic gibberish.
And it makes the strip work so much better.

name: shrewbie
text: piss shivers shouldn't be calmed. They're pleasurable beyond belief

name: rasalghul
text: The guy with the mustache visits our office a few times a month.  I'll see if I can't get a 'scrip for Zyrelax to leave on the sink for him.
